solution_line_template: 2/5 of the total amount of sales Mr. Brandon made yesterday, which were credit purchases, were worth {credit_sales_fraction}*${total_sales}=${<<{credit_sales_fraction}*{total_sales}={credit_sales_amount}>>}{credit_sales_amount}
The cash sales that Mr. Brandon made yesterday was ${total_sales}-${credit_sales_amount}=${<<{total_sales}-{credit_sales_amount}={cash_sales_amount}>>}{cash_sales_amount}
